original_text: From the time that John the Baptist began to teach until now, the kingdom of heaven is becoming very strong. Strong people are trying very much to attack it.
korean_text: 세례 요한의 때부터 지금까지 천국은 침노를 당하나니 침노하는 자는 빼앗느니라

sentences.original_text: From the time that John the Baptist began to teach
the kingdom of heaven is becoming very strong
Strong people are trying very much
